text: Barwar is a town and a nagar panchayat in Lakhimpur Kheri district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is a crowded town situated near the shahjahanpur. The Gomti river flows through the town. The town is divided into 11 wards. ==Demographics== India census, ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Lakhimpur Kheri district
title: Barwar, Lakhimpur Kheri
